name: Rubicon Games
tag_list: korea, social-games, social-gaming, social-networks, nate, cyworld, naver, daum, mixi
overview:
Rubicon Games is a Seoul, South Korea based social games developer and publisher. We develop games of all generes for top social networks in Korea, including Nate (Cyworld), Naver and Daum. Since March 2010, we have released two social games (mini-games) on the Nate platform. With our immediate focus on our lineup of simulation titles, we aim to attract a larger user base in the near future. Currently, our games can be found on both Korean and Japanese social networks, in Nate and Mixi.

In addition to developing our own games, we are planning a network for foreign developers who are interested in publishing their games into Korea.
